prompt:
Best time to book LGA→HKG within next 60 days.
Include: fare ranges (USD), typical booking window (days before departure),
peak/holiday effects, basic bag policy differences, and 1–2 concrete examples.
Return STRICT JSON: {
  "origin": string, "destination": string, "window_days": number,
  "best_window_days": [min,max], "fare_low_usd": number, "fare_high_usd": number,
  "notes": string
}

message.content:
{
  "origin": "LGA",
  "destination": "HKG",
  "window_days": 30,
  "best_window_days": [21, 45],
  "fare_low_usd": 800,
  "fare_high_usd": 1500,
  "notes": "Booking 21 to 45 days in advance typically yields the best fares. Peak travel periods, such as holidays (e.g., Christmas, Chinese New Year), can increase fares significantly. Basic economy fares may include restrictions on carry-on bags, while standard fares usually allow one checked bag."
}
